head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MALHAME, GEORGE C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MALHAME, GEORGE C.

block.p: MALHAME-George C. On May 17 May 17, of Garden City, formerly of Douglaston, New York. Beloved husband of Gloria. Dear father of Therese, Edmond, James, Elizabeth, Jean, Mary, Thomas and the late Charles. Also survived by seven grandchildren. Brother of the late Edmond. In repose at The Fairchild Funeral Chapel, 1570 Northern Boulevard, Manhasset on Thursday from 3-5 and 7-9PM. Funeral Mass on Friday at St. Anastasia RC Church, Douglaston, with interment to follow in Holy Rood Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to The American Liver Foundation or Cancer Care.
